holidays.title: Action Day for Tolerance and Respect between People
Armenian Genocide Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Armenian Genocide Remembrance Day commemorates the lives lost and the history of Armenia during World War I.

holidays.title: Coronation Day of Pope Benedict XVI
holidays.description: We’re saying a prayer as we observe Coronation Day of Pope Benedict XVI.

holidays.title: Donate Life Blue and Green Day
holidays.description: Let’s get our Blue and Green on as we help donate to life this holiday.

holidays.title: Fashion Revolution Day
holidays.description: Finally, let us know more about this powerful day in the history of the fashion industry.

holidays.title: International Day of Multilateralism and Diplomacy for Peace
holidays.description: Make a global effort through multilateralism to promote world peace, security, and cooperation.

holidays.title: National Brandon Day
holidays.description: Explore the variations and cultural influences that revolve around this name that’s predominantly given to boys.

holidays.title: National Hairball Awareness Day
holidays.description: Hairballs are a healthy part of animals’ routines, but can potentially be an underlying health issue.

holidays.title: National Pet Care for All Day
holidays.description: All pets and their families deserve access to affordable, quality pet care.

holidays.title: National Pigs in a Blanket Day
holidays.description: A holiday celebrating one of our favorite comfort foods — pork sausage (or hotdogs) baked in pastry.

holidays.title: National Skipping Day
holidays.description: Having fun while exercising doesn't get any better!

holidays.title: New Kids on the Block Day
holidays.description: Let us take a closer look into the New Kids on the Block.

holidays.title: Scream Day
holidays.description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for… Scream Day! Celebrate with us right here!

holidays.title: Undiagnosed Children's Awareness Day
holidays.description: Children who are affected by Syndromes Without a Name and their families need our support.

holidays.title: World Day for Animals in Laboratories
holidays.description: Animal lives matter too, so join us today in advocating for the protection of their rights.

holidays.title: World Women’s Wellness Day
holidays.description: Join us, and let’s support women’s health across the world this World Women’s Wellness Day!

holidays.title: Barbra Streisand’s Birthday
holidays.description: Streisand is a multi-talented, award-winning singer, actress, and director who’s inspired us to pursue our dreams.

holidays.title: Joe Keery’s Birthday
holidays.description: Other than his role in “Stranger Things,” there's much more to this legend with great hair.

holidays.title: Kelly Clarkson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This renowned singer, songwriter, actress, and author is an inspiration in many ways.

holidays.title: Thomas Sanders’s Birthday
holidays.description: With singing and acting added to his credits, this entertainer is an all-rounder.
